Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AimSniperRifleAction
    Allows the player to spend a turn aiming at the target to increase the damage they inflict
    Ammunition
    An ammunition box which allows players to pick up ammunition for their ranged weapons
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Bite  
    ChantAction  
    ChantBehaviour  
    ConsumeHarvestedAction  
    Corpse
    Class representing Corpse which extends PortableItem, it represents dead human
    CraftZombieClubAction  
    CraftZombieMaceAction  
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    Endgame
    Class representing the game world, including the locations of all Actors, the player, and the playing grid.It is overrides World so that it can end the game when there are no more humans and no more zombies and mambo marie.
    ExitAction  
    Farmer  
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertiliseNewAction  
    FertiliseNewBehaviour  
    FireShotgunAction  
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    HarvestAction  
    HarvestBehaviour  
    HarvestedCrop  
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    MamboMarie
    Class representing Mambo Marie and related functionality
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    Punch  
    RipeCrop  
    SelectTargetAction
    Action which allows the player to select a target to attack with the sniper rifle
    ShootAction  
    ShootSniperAction
    Allows the player to shoot the targetted Actor with a sniper rifle
    Shotgun
    A shotgun which is a weapon that allows player to deal close range area damage
    SniperRifle
    A sniper rifle which is a weapon that allows player to target any enemy on the map
    SowAction  
    SowBehaviour  
    TakeAmmoAction
    This action allows actors to pick up ammunition if they are standing on an Ammunition item.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    UnripeCrop  
    UseSniperRifleAction
    This action allows the player to use their sniper rifle.
    Vehicle  
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
